Title: Brothers and Boyfriends
Plot: When there is a gas leak at the Gallaghers along comes a sexy fireman named Sean. He gets the attention of Ian and Mandy but which one of them will win the race to get the Sean into bed? Also, Carl finds himself in a risky situation.
ParentalRatingReason: Violence, offensive language and sex scenes
GuestStars: Matt Cross, Phil Corbitt, Alex Slater, Angela Holmes, Michelle Holmes, Martin Walsh, John Wilson
